descriptionHtml:
Original mesh by Crosscrusade. He is MIA though, so I\'m making some conversions.

I really want user-images; feel free to upload!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/TvSbP7N.jpg[/img]

Requires:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992]SeveNBase[/url]

Recommended:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34160]Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP[/url].
author: yabo
